title: Little Black Girl Lost 5: The Diary of Josephine Baptiste: Lauren's Story
description: In this fifth gripping installment of the series, the author shows fans what has made Johnnie Wise the person she is, and takes readers all the way back to her beginning: to the story of her grandmother, Josephine Baptiste, a 16-year-old Nigerian girl who is captured by Dutch traders and sold into slavery.
author: Keith Lee Johnson
